name: @cryptohub/coco
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.build: npm run build-ltr && npm run build-rtl
scripts.build-ltr: npm run build-add-version && npm run build-clean && npm run build-css && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run build-cleancss && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-rtl: npm run build-add-version-rtl && npm run build-clean && npm run build-css-rtl && npm run build-autoprefix-rtl && npm run build-cleancss-rtl && npm run build-rtl-to-ltr
scripts.build-add-version-rtl: sed -i.old '1s;"[0-9.]*";"'$(echo $npm_package_version)'";' style/coco.sass && rm -rf style/coco.sass.old && sed -i.old '2s;false;true;' style/coco.sass && rm -rf style/coco.sass.old
scripts.build-sass: cp -a style dist/sass && stripcomments -w --language=Sass --confirm-overwrite dist/sass/**/*.sass && spaces-to-tabs dist/sass/**/*.sass -s 2
scripts.pack: VER=$(echo $npm_package_version | sed s/[.]/-/g) && mv dist coco-v$npm_package_version && zip -r coco-v$VER.zip coco-v$npm_package_version && mv coco-v$npm_package_version dist
scripts.check-browsersync: npm list -g | grep browser-sync || npm install -g browser-sync --no-shrinkwrap
scripts.start: npm run build-css --watch && npm run build-rtl --watch && browser-sync start --config test/bs-config.js
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run check-browsersync && npm run build-docs && npm run compress
